name: Artoo, Brave Little Droid (AI)
Lore: 'Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala''s starship and getting her to Tatooine.',
Text: 'While aboard any starfighter, adds 2 to its power and hyperspeed. While in battle at a system, may place Artoo in Used Pile to cancel a just-drawn battle destiny. Cancels Lateral Damage targeting a starship at same system.',
